page.title: 08BLAGDON SCHOOL MUSICAL 1985
page.content: For our school musical yesterday we performed{David and Goliath}written by {Mr N.J. Walton.}We started practising about May 1985.{Mrs Walton,}our Deputy Head was the director.The choir and drama acted out this rock musical. First of all we started learning the words to the songs.After about six weeks we started acting out the play.We had to wear blue trousers and a white top.We all had to wear the same clothes because it was a modern drama. {Churchill Swing Band}accompanied us in our singing.It consisted of{Mr Nigel {Walton,Keyboard,Cathy Dobbins,Bass {guitar,Peter Murphy,drums.}We did the play on Tuesday 16th July 1985.We gave two performances, held at 2.30pm and 7.00pm.The money we raised was{Â£130 for the{'Live Aid' Famine in Ethiopia {Appeal.
